messages.content: You are an expert at analyzing user queries and mapping them to appropriate workflow patterns. Always respond with valid JSON.

Analyze this user query and determine which workflow patterns are most relevant:

QUERY: "list all TypeScript files and analyze their exports"

No project context available

AVAILABLE PATTERNS:
- project_analysis: Project Discovery & Architecture Analysis - Comprehensive project structure and framework detection
- api_mapping: API Endpoint Discovery & Documentation - Systematic discovery and documentation of API endpoints
- quality_analysis: Code Quality Assessment & Issue Detection - Systematic discovery and analysis of code quality issues
- file_exploration: File System Exploration & Analysis - General file system exploration and content analysis

RULE-BASED ANALYSIS FOUND:
- Project Discovery & Architecture Analysis: 35.5% confidence

Please analyze the query intent and provide pattern relevance scores (0-100) for each pattern.
Consider:
1. Query semantics and user intent
2. Project context if available  
3. Complexity and scope of the request
4. Most appropriate workflow sequence

Respond in JSON format:
{
  "patterns": [
    {"id": "pattern_id", "confidence": 85, "reasoning": "why this pattern fits"}
  ],
  "query_analysis": "overall analysis of user intent"
}
